article_text: Gov. Rick Scott has not replied to a congressional request for input on future funding of the Children’s Health Insurance Program, a federal-state partnership that covers more than 400,000 kids in Florida.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Florida, governor, Rick Scott, CHIP, children's health insurance, Medicaid
article_metadata.title: Florida silent on children’s health insurance program future | Miami Herald
